channel.title: Programming on Dev.Poga
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Dev.Poga

item.title: Notes on the Implementation of Lua 5.3
item.description: Notes on the Implementation on Lua 5.3 is a collection of my notes on the Lua 5.3 source code. It’s a mix of both high-level ideas and interesting details in the source code. There can be errors. Feel free to contact me if you have any question or feedback. Enjoy.

item.title: Analyze Streaming Data with Rust, Actix, and Lua
item.description: actix-lua provides a safe scripting environment for the actix framework with the Lua Programming Language. Here’s an example about what you can achieve with it. Hope you can try these ideas in your next project. Definitely not a world-changing project Path of Exile(PoE) is an online multiplayer RPG. In PoE, players get powerful, unique items by killing monsters. Then, they put their items to the market and trade with others.
